revisionDesc.change: Added the list of authors, who published journal articles between 1870 and 1920 and who were recorded by archive.sakhrit.co
revisionDesc.tei:change: Improved person nodes that had references to VIAF, by querying VIAF and adding birth , death , and idno .
revisionDesc.change: Added automated xml:id s for every element that is a descendant of tei:text and had no existing xml:id following the pattern "name()_generate-id()".
revisionDesc.tei:change: Added the xml:lang attribute to all nodes that lacked this attribute. The value is based on the closest ancestor.
